This class is implementation of SiGeR gestire algorithm.

Author:
Itay Cohen, Sergey Persikov

MouseGesturesRecognizer

public MouseGesturesRecognizer()
Method Detail

clearTemporaryInfo

public void clearTemporaryInfo()
Clears temporary info about previous gesture.

getGesture

public java.lang.String getGesture()
Returns string representation of mouse gesture.

Returns:
String representation of mouse gesture. "L" for left, "R" for right, "U" for up, "D" for down movements. For example: "ULD".

getGridSize

public int getGridSize()
Returns current grid size (minimum mouse movement length to be recognized).

Returns:
Grid size in pixels. Default is 30.

isGestureRecognized

public boolean isGestureRecognized()
Indicates whether any movements were recognized.

Returns:
true if there are recognized movements; false otherwise

processMouseEvent

public void processMouseEvent(java.awt.event.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
Processes mouse event.

Parameters:
mouseEvent - MouseEvent

setGridSize

public void setGridSize(int gridSize)
Sets grid size (minimum mouse movement length to be recognized).

Parameters:
gridSize - New grid size in pixels
